籤詩版本二:
Wobadwira m'banja lolemera kuyambira ndili mwana, chilichonse chomwe chili pamaso panga chimakhala chapamwamba
Lamba Wofiirira Wagolide Wapatsidwa kwa Inu ndi Mfumu, Adzakhala Wotchuka Padziko Lonse Lapansi
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ndi chizindikiro cha chipata cha chinjoka chikutsegulidwa.
Zonse zidzasintha kukhala zabwino.
解曰: Akaidi amakhululukidwa. Matenda amatanthauza mtendere. Longmen ali ndi mwayi wokumana. Wodziwika mu likulu lonse.
籤詩故事一:
◇Luo Tong akupereka ulemu kwa iye
Mzera wa Tang unasonkhana kuti ukhazikitse mtendere wa Northern Fan. Emperor Taizong adaganiza zotsogolera ulendowu payekha, koma adatsekeredwa mumzinda wa Muyang, choncho Cheng Yaojin adabwerera ku Central Plains kuti akapulumutse asilikali. Cheng Yaojin anali munthu wolankhula molankhula komanso wolankhula.
Pampikisano wa masewera omenyera nkhondo, akuluakulu ankhondo kuti akagonjetse kumpoto adalembedwa.Luo Tong wazaka khumi ndi zisanu ndi ziwiri adatulukira pamwamba ndikulamulira ulendo wopita kumpoto.
(Mawu akuti "Luotong sweeps the north" ndi fanizo la mnyamata wochita bwino)
聖意: Pempherani nyumba ndi nyumba, dzipempherereni nokha, pemphererani zabwino zonse m'dzinja ndi m'nyengo yozizira, zabwino zonse mu bizinesi, ukwati, ndi zabwino zonse ku Liujia.
